data.title: Listen on NTS
data.meta_description:
On 9 October 2017, Uio Loi was a guest on Creep Zone w/ James Pants & Marc Schaller. Uio Loi has been played on NTS in shows including The Early Bird Show w/ Maria Somerville, featured first on 27 July 2014. Songs played include Template_3, sock collector and Pijj's Cove ~ Title Screen.

Uio Loi is the alias of Kyle Yerhot, a music composer and sound designer who has released three albums over the last seven years, most recently 'Template' in 2018.
data.text:
